message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
You're starting high, Alice. I'm going for a more aggressive split.
You're pushing for a big split, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's find a middle ground.
I'm not backing down, Alice. You'll have to meet my terms.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This is a fair split that gives you a majority of the remaining value.
I'm not giving up yet. I think I can get a better deal.

I'm not budging, Alice. I think I can get a better deal if we keep going.
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.

This is my last serious offer, Bob. I'm not going to give you more than this.
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it.
